title: 地皮大小 还要地皮的砖块怎么改变啊 求解答
author: a15941658433

replies.author: 伪笑
replies.txt_content:
plotme:
    PlotAutoLimit: 1000
    PathWidth: 7
    PlotSize: 64   修改大小
    BottomBlockId: '7'
    WallBlockId: '44'  这个是修改砖块的
    PlotFloorBlockId: '2'
    PlotFillingBlockId: '3'
    RoadMainBlockId: '5'
    RoadStripeBlockId: '5:2'
    RoadHeight: 64
    DaysToExpiration: 0
    ProtectedBlocks:
